message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it holds for you. Let me know your thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $1,100,000 is simply too low for me. Considering the value this product brings, I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000.  This is a fair price that reflects both our interests. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $1,300,000, but I'm still not sure if that's the best price for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer with $1,250,000. I think that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to come up to $1,250,000, but I'm still a little short of my target price. To make this work for both of us, I'm willing to go down to $1,350,000. This price is closer to my bottom line, and I believe it still reflects the value the product offers you.  Let's see if we can finalize this deal.

I understand you're trying to reach your target price, but I'm still not comfortable with $1,350,000. I'm willing to go up to $1,280,000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
